name: Equal: A Puzzle Game
description:
How To Play:  Create equivlent fractions by moving the number tiles to fraction lines.

Click a tile to select it, hover over it to unselect. WASD to move a tile, tiles move until they hit another object.

If you get stuck press R to restart.

Good Luck and Have fun!

Update Log

Update 0 :  Added first 10 levels (level 11l is currenty not completable)

Update 0.1 :  Added more levels ()
